Desc.entry: A charity that aims to develop the area for the long-term benefit of the public as an environmental, historical and educational amenity, as well as conserving the green space, the dam, its wildlife and the natural beauty of their settings. Aims to: de-silt the dam and stream; improve fishing facilities; improve footpaths and lighting and include disabled access; introduce new seating, litter and dog bins; provide regular refuse clearance; improve BMX track and install a robust playground; manage woodland to increase the diversity of the wildlife habitat. The group works collaboratively with Sheffield City Council and the Environment Agency.
